thread.title: Volvo robot to put binmen on the scrapheap of history
thread.title_full: Volvo robot to put binmen on the scrapheap of history

title: Volvo robot to put binmen on the scrapheap of history
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now   of history A Volvo robot lifts a bin in this design to stir imaginations Published 3 minutes ago 
Binmen could be left by the roadside under plans for robots to collect domestic waste. 
Volvo, the Swedish   “robot-  handlers” to accompany bin lorries. 
A design released by the company showed two-wheeled robots bringing rubbish bins to the lorry to be emptied without any human involvement. 
The company said that its goal was to produce robots to operate without waking families, suggesting that once the humans had been binned, collections could take place at night. Per-Martin Johansson, a Volvo spokesman, said: “We believe that, Subscribe now
